metadata.synopsis: After Shadowheart arrives at Goblin Camp with the Orpheus box and protects the party from Voice of the Absolute, she asks to be recruited. She is desperate at this point, so either this happens or she will start combat.NOTE: this currently only triggers at the goblin camp, but may also be needed as a fallback at the start of Act 2.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Shadowheart needs to be alive and not recruited- Enter Goblin Camp inner area (close to festivities)- will play after dialogue "GOB_Orpheus_VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox"

7.speaker: Shadowheart
7.text: You're lucky I managed to catch up with you when I did - we're both lucky, in fact.

32.speaker: Player
32.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player hasn't met SH yet.

52.speaker: Shadowheart
52.text: I'm Shadowheart - we were on the nautiloid together. We've both got the same problem... though only I might have the solution.
52.context: NodeContext: Urgent, cutting right to the chase

17.speaker: Shadowheart
17.text: I don't know how, but this artefact is protecting me from whoever controls our parasites. You won't get much farther without it shielding you, trust me.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nods to the box in her hands on 'this artefact', then puts it away

27.speaker: Shadowheart
27.text: We share a common goal - getting rid of the tadpoles. Seems you've come to the same conclusion as I did, that these Absolute cultists are involved in some way. Only sensible that we help one another.
27.context: InternalNodeContext: Only plays if the player concluded the forest cultist scene peacefully/heard of the absolute

64.speaker: Shadowheart
64.text: You need me at your side.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: If that thing's protecting you, why do you need me?

39.speaker: Shadowheart
39.text: The artefact is being hunted, and so I'm being hunted. The Absolute's forces want it. Githyanki raiders want it.

49.speaker: Lae'zel
49.text: So it is you the kith'raki come for? This artefact is valuable - the knights will be relentless in their pursuit.

76.speaker: Shadowheart
76.text: I can't afford to get rid of it, but I can't protect it alone either. I'm lucky to have made it this far.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: So we help each other? Sounds reasonable.

50.speaker: Shadowheart
50.text: Very. So what do you say?

70.speaker: Shadowheart
70.text: Wait. Perhaps we shouldn't. You're not the one I need to talk to, are you? Not really.
70.context: NodeContext: realisation that she isn't talking to the person in charge.

87.speaker: Shadowheart
87.text: I can feel it, in your head. You follow someone else's orders. I'll deal with them, not you.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: Fine - wait here. I'll fetch someone to talk to you.

72.speaker: Shadowheart
72.text: Make it fast. And don't even think of venturing far without me, or it'll be your last bad decision.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: You know, I think I'd rather take my chances without you.

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: There's no chances without me - only certain death, or worse.
5.context: NodeContext: Desperate. She needs the player to accept her.

42.speaker: Shadowheart
42.text: Bring whoever leads you to speak to me. Then maybe you'll have a hope of survival.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: I don't need to deal with you - I just need the artefact. Hand it over.

48.speaker: Shadowheart
48.text: Damn. We could have helped each other. So be it.
48.context: NodeContext: Angry resignation. Instead of joining sides, she'll have to fight the player.

41.speaker: Shadowheart
41.text: You seem overburdened with hangers-on already.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: I'll mark my camp on your map. You can rest there.
55.context: InternalNodeContext: Switch to different speaker slot for available avatar

60.speaker: Shadowheart
60.text: Fine. Just stay safe. We need each other.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Looks like you're out of luck then.
22.context: InternalNodeContext: Switch to different speaker slot for available avatar

33.speaker: Shadowheart
33.text: No - either we join forces, or you don't go anywhere. Tell me where to find your camp at least.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: All right, I'll mark your map.
78.context: InternalNodeContext: Switch to different speaker slot for available avatar

71.speaker: Player
71.context: InternalNodeContext: Switch to different speaker slot for available avatar

24.speaker: Player
24.text: You're not going anywhere with me, but I'll take that artefact.

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: No! The artefact stays with me. And I'll do whatever's necessary to protect it, if I can't make you see reason.
3.context: NodeContext: Desperate. She needs the player to accept her.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: Fine, you can come with me.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Why do you need me so badly?
23.context: InternalNodeContext: This QN only if SH hasn't explained why she wants to join the player.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: My companion thinks this artefact is important to her people. How did you come to have it?

88.speaker: Shadowheart
88.text: Never mind how I got it - just be glad I have it. For now, let's just help each other. What do you say?

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Why do you have this to begin with?

83.speaker: Player
83.text: I'll take the artefact, but I don't need you.

35.speaker: Shadowheart
35.text: It stays with me - I'll kill to protect it. Already have.

85.speaker: Player
85.text: I don't need you bringing wrathful githyanki down on my head - clear off.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: If my fellow githyanki want that artefact, then I should take it from you, not join you.

79.speaker: Shadowheart
79.text: That wouldn't be wise. Even if you managed to get it off of me, do you really think your kin would welcome you with open arms?

31.speaker: Shadowheart
31.text: You're infected - they'll just put you down like a rabid animal. Your best chance is with me.
31.context: NodeContext: harsh, but with a glimmer of hope and reason at the end.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: Fine - but where do I fit into this?

44.speaker: Player
44.text: I'll take my chances without you. Clear off.

43.speaker: Shadowheart
43.text: I'll wait here, until you come to your senses. For both our sakes, I hope that happens very soon.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: These Absolute forces you mentioned - what do you know about them?

69.speaker: Shadowheart
69.text: That voice we heard - all sorts are flocking to its banner, worshipping it as a god.

65.speaker: Shadowheart
65.text: Humans, goblins, and many more. It's given them a common purpose, and they're building an army in its name.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: How generous. What aren't you telling me?

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Sounds like it's that artefact I need, not you.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: You'd better start making a lot more sense very rapidly.

82.speaker: Shadowheart
82.text: That voice you just felt? It's because of what was done to us - the infection.
82.context: NodeContext: Urgent, cutting right to the chase

54.speaker: Shadowheart
54.text: That doesn't matter - what matters is how it can help us against the monsters in our heads.
54.context: NodeContext: Urgent, cutting right to the chase

14.speaker: Player
14.text: I don't know what just happened, but keep away from me.

57.speaker: Shadowheart
57.text: Hear me out - your life depends on it. We've both got the same problem... though only I might have the solution.
57.context: NodeContext: Urgent, cutting right to the chase

25.speaker: Shadowheart
25.text: Yes... you're someone I can deal with, I think. I felt it in your head.
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH hands are empty (gith artefact is in her inventory)NodeContext: Intuitive understanding - this is the person she's been seeking

59.speaker: Shadowheart
59.text: We both have the same problem - the parasites. You won't make it much farther without me. I have an artefact that can protect us until we find a cure.
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH hands are empty (gith artefact is in her inventory)NodeContext: Short, no-nonsense 'take me with you' pitch.

26.speaker: Shadowheart
26.text: Changed your mind yet? I don't think either of us has the luxury of time - not against what we're facing.
26.context: InternalNodeContext: This greeting if an avatar spoke to SH previously but declined to recruit her.

38.speaker: Shadowheart
38.text: You need me with you. Let me speak to your leader, and we can press on.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH hands are empty (gith artefact is in her inventory)NodeContext: All business
